text: so our devs are working each using their own sandboxes and if they make changes to their local db it would be good to be able to push those amends to the live or test environments <@U7SL518D6>
so this is multi select correct?
The way i do this is using a Lookup table in a zapier filter that checks whats the name is and returns the id which will always be consecutive from 0
This looks very promising. It's not a multi-select, its just a select field, but it looks like I can use that same approach for the select field. Gonna give this a try, thanks a lot.
Perfect for what I needed! Thanks a lot <@U504BHZ6K> and <@UG52C29EE>
